history.content:
I'm a transfer and I took 3 different classes that all articulate to their respective American Cultures course according to Assist.org at my last college. None of them qualified as an approved American Cultures course, apparently. My college isn't even listed under the "Approved AC Courses at Other Colleges" page.


As far as the petitioning process goes, it seems like the petition can only qualify 1 class per petition. So my question is, should I submit a combined petition for all 3 classes? Or should I submit 3 separate petitions at the same time, 1 for each class. My graduation timeline is fairly tight, so waiting for a singular petition decision is probably not a good idea, which is why I want to submit all 3 classes at the same time.
history.subject: 3 American Cultures courses at another college
